subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bruce Vaughan shot par 71 to take a one-shot lead after the second round of the Senior British Open at Troon, Scotland. He led John Cook (71) by one stroke, and Tom Watson (71), Bernhard Langer (71) and Eduardo Romero (73) by two.
snippet: Bruce Vaughan shot par 71 to take a one-shot lead after the second round of the Senior British Open at Troon, Scotland. He led John Cook (71) by one stroke, and Tom Watson (71), Bernhard Langer (71) and Eduardo Romero (73) by two.
